TEI.2.document_title: William Hardin to Stephen F Austin, 08-29-1832

barker_notes.barker_summary: William Hardin to Austin, August 29, 1832. Complaining of bad treatment by men about Harrisburg. (Omitted.)William Hardin to Austin, Trinity, August 29, 1832. Troubles about land title. (Omitted.)
